block.formulaText:
cms.PageExp.Local('EmpID',oa.TodoMidExp.queryEmpIDByID(cms.Yigo2MidExp.GetLoginOperator()));
cms.PageExp.Local(
	"data",
    cms.DataExp.QueryList("
		select * from (select a.Topic,a.UrgencyDeg,a.OID,DATE_FORMAT(a.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d  %H:%i') as starttime,h.name as CREATOR,r.name as addre
		from OA_MeetingInSide_h a LEFT JOIN oa_employee_h h on a.empid=h.oid LEFT JOIN oa_meetingroom_h r on r.oid=a.meetingroom 
		where a.Status=1200 and Participants like '%"&cms.PageExp.Local('EmpID')&"%' order by billdate desc) h ORDER BY h.StartTime desc limit 5
    ")
)
block.tmplText:
#foreach($line in $data)

$line.TOPIC

 时间：$line.STARTTIME 地点：$line.ADDRE 发起人：$line.CREATOR
#end
#foreach($line in $data) #if($data.size()>1) #if($line.URGENCYDEG==10) #elseif($line.URGENCYDEG==20) #else #end #end #end
